heading: Welcome to DigiBank NetBanking
message: Dear Customer, Welcome to the new login page of DigiBank NetBanking. Its lighter look and feel is designed to give you the best possible user experience. Please continue to login using your customer ID and password.
securityMsg: Your security is of utmost importance.
registerMsg: for a host of convenient features
text-1: We have added a host of new features!
text-2: You can now do so much more:
text-3: Anywhere access through Desktop or mobile
